biotools.summary: CLEP is A Hybrid Data- and Knowledge-Driven Framework for Generating Patient Representations. CLEP is a framework that contains novel methods for generating patient representations from any patient level data and its corresponding prior knowledge encoded in a knowledge graph. The framework is depicted in the graphic below.
